mathdrawya jawaramkaruwanta maraniya dandanaya laba dimata gath thiranaya hamuwe atham jathyanthara sanwidhana ada shri lankawata tharjana ella karamin sitina athara rate aarthika sanwardhanayata jathyanthara sanwidhanawala sahaya awashya namuth rate swadhinathwayata atha gasimata ho ema swadhinathwayata tharjanayak ella kirimata ema kisiwakuta ayithiyak nomathi bawada janadhipathiwaraya ehidi awadharanaya kaleya.

eya wanahi, jathyanthara wa punarjiwanaya wana panthi aragalawala kotasak lesa samaja ha prajathanthrawadi ayithin matha ella wana praharayata erehi wa shri lankawa thula ismathu wana imahath mahajana wirodhaya madhyaye, janadhipathi sirisena, agamathi ranil wikramasinha ha wipaksha nayaka mahinda rajapaksha wisin nayakathwaya dena palaka prabhuwe kandayam athara pawathina deshapalana kakotaganime prathipalayaki. 2015 di sirisena balayata paminiye, ewakata janadhipathi rajapakshage aanduwa kerehi pawathi dawantha wirodhaya gasa kamini.
